sentences.sContent: His plane stopped in Hawaii to refuel.
sentences.sCn: 他的飞机在夏威夷停下来加燃料。

remMethod.val: re(再) + fuel(燃料) → 重新得到燃料

trans.tranCn: 补给燃料； 重新得到燃料
trans.tranOther: When an aircraft or other vehicle refuels or when someone refuels it, it is filled with more fuel so that it can continue its journey
